title: Some people think that Frostqueen's claim item line is good
body:
...

http://33.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lmj4cxnVZS1qb7645o1_500.gif

Yeah if you like putting yourself at constant risk unless you're sona (don't play sona rofl) or some other poke centric support that has long range which is unviable because ADC's and buffing them is literally the SUPER MOST CRITICAL THING in this meta. Sona, Zyra, etc are useless trash now. And disgust me.

Also the item, since it is so risk heavy, has no gold generation worth talking about unless your enemy team comp lets you poke them asunder. I can't even get away with that on my plat normals on this account, how the fuck do you expect that to be viable higher?

Enemy team picks blitz, you picked something actually viable in ADC dominance meta like lulu and get grabbed and 100-0'd
